com.mapbox.services.directions.v5.models

Class StepManeuver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.directions.v5.models.StepManeuver

  • public class StepManeuver
extends java.lang.Object
    Gives maneuver information about one LegStep.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocation

        public double[] getLocation()
        Returns:
        double array of [longitude, latitude] for the snapped coordinate.

      • getBearingBefore

        public double getBearingBefore()
        Number between 0 and 360 indicating the clockwise angle from true north to the direction of travel right before the maneuver.
        Returns:
        double with value from 0 to 360.

      • getBearingAfter

        public double getBearingAfter()
        Number between 0 and 360 indicating the clockwise angle from true north to the direction of travel right after the maneuver.
        Returns:
        double with value from 0 to 360.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        This indicates the type of maneuver. It can be any of these listed:

        • turn - a basic turn into direction of the modifier
        • new name - the road name changes (after a mandatory turn)
        • depart - indicates departure from a leg
        • arrive - indicates arrival to a destination of a leg
        • merge - merge onto a street
        • ramp - take a ramp
        • fork
        • end of road - road ends in a T intersection
        • continue - continue on a street after a turn
        • roundabout - traverse roundabout, has additional field getExit()
        Returns:
        String with type of maneuver.

      • getModifier

        public java.lang.String getModifier()
        This indicates the mode of the maneuver. If type is of turn, the modifier indicates the change in direction accomplished through the turn. If the type is of depart/arrive, the modifier indicates the position of waypoint from the current direction of travel.
        Returns:
        String with modifier.

      • getInstruction

        public java.lang.String getInstruction()
        A human-readable instruction of how to execute the returned maneuver.
        Returns:
        String with instruction.

      • getExit

        public int getExit()
        Roundabouts will have an additional parameter.
        Returns:
        int value

      • asPosition

        public Position asPosition()
        Converts double array getLocation() to a Position. You'll typically want to use this format instead of getLocation() as it's easier to work with.
        Returns:
        Position.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String with all StepManeuver information within.
